name: POWERHOURS – Fitness Classes Mobile Design System
description:
Accelerate your design process and elevate your understanding of UI/UX with this design system; crafted to model UX of leading fitness class apps such as Peloton


  • 80+ components (70+ in the free version)
  • Thousands of variants
  • 40+ screens (30+ in the free version)
  • Autolayout 4.0 (partial)
  • Dark mode switch
  • Animated prototypes with interactive components (+ interactive icons)
  • 7 prototyped flows with various animation examples (some converted to images in the free version)


There is in fact a little more to this file and if you'd like to get access and support my team, then we'd love it if you could stop by


Support Us


We strive to bring you the newest design systems, crafted by a team who have spent years at the forefront of technology, designing digital interfaces for the masses. Our designs are based heavily on existing real world flows to ensure the user experience is proven and tested, and so that the design solution is also able to actually be implemented by developers and engineers.


No video on this file but, feel free to check out my channel for some other design tutorials


- ✌️Izzy
